title: Reporting on Science (Part 2) – extended with Elise Andrew of IFLS and Bill Nye
description: Neil deGrasse Tyson and veteran science journalist Miles O’Brien discuss the conflict between journalism and corporate America. Plus, a new interview about science deniers with Elise Andrew and Bill Nye.
author: feed@startalkradio.net (Neil deGrasse Tyson)
